text: Fred Pearce (4 September 1916 – 8 May 1964) was a former Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * *Fred Pearce's profile at Collingwood Forever Category:1916 births Category:1964 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players
title: Fred Pearce (footballer)
